\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_cell_range}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLCell\+Range Class Reference}

This class encapsulates the concept of a cell range, i.\+e. a square area (or subset) of cells in a spreadsheet.

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class encapsulates the concept of a cell range, i.\+e. a square area (or subset) of cells in a spreadsheet.
